title: Banyuseri Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Visit Banyuseri Village, a traditional settlement in North Bali known for its unique customs and serene setting.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, meet locals and learn about their customs.

title: Banyuseri Village & North Bali Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Banyuseri Village and North Bali's attractions.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village, meet locals and learn about their customs.
